A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: too many slapstick moments that took away the weight of the film\, Rose got more backstory than every other character and also SHE'S THE WORST\, the acting is really off on many scenes\, Luke did not just disappoint\, he smeared his legacy with the stinkiest of shits (also let's not kid ourselves and say they Leia has been trained) \, General Hux is unfortunately a child wearing a grown man's mask\, convoluted subplot with Finn and Rose was egregious
